<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Dragon's Eye Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=502)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 71

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This charm, a dragon-shaped pendant worn like a necklace or set into armor or clothing as a decoration, is warm and smooth to the touch. It must be held in one hand to be used (pressing the palm of one’s hand to the charm also works, provided that your hand is otherwise empty). It has four distinct powers.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _dragon’s eye charm_ manifests fire for you to wield against your foe. You cast a 5th-level [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) spell with a spell attack roll of +13.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The charm’s pupil becomes plainly visible. You can look through the charm to gain [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) for as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _dragon’s eye charm_ shrouds you in a faintly glowing layer of golden energy. You gain fire resistance 5 for 10 minutes.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You can speak and understand [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
